text: Anɨgek, bɨawl ne ak nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨnɨgab, Bɨ tap yɨp kod mɨdep tɨmel ak, binɨb gos tɨpagɨl nɨŋɨd gɨpal tek ak gup agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak nɨgɨm, binɨb lum awl yɨl okok apal, Mɨñɨl tɨtay dɨl kɨdek mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun agɨl, gos ak nɨgɨlɨg gel amub agak. Pen God binɨb ne mɨlek adek sɨŋak mɨdebal okok, kɨli gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd ma gɨpal agak.
